synopsis.text: Cai Xiaoguang, an aspiring online writer, stumbles upon an unusual website that promises to transform her stories into virtual reality experiences. Eager to explore, she enters the fantastical world of 'The Hand of God,' only to find herself transformed into a spirited werewolf named Da Niu. Caught in the midst of a national treasure heist, she embarks on an exhilarating journey to unravel the mystery alongside the charming and enigmatic Goat King, Wang Cai. As they traverse through the virtual realm, their humorous and heartwarming adventures unfold into a captivating tale of friendship and love. Prepare to be enchanted by this delightful blend of fantasy, romance, and suspense in the world of 'The Hand of God.'
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
